title: Honningbarna bootlegs release oct 8th 2011 - "Ned" +
description:
"Ned" and "PÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥ Tynn Is" are the two first songs in a series of bootleg releases by norwegian cello-punk sensation Honningbarna. 

"Ned" is about the sudden and short-lived pro-democracy surge following the july 22nd attacks in Norway. "PÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥ Tynn Is" is about the EU and Euro-crisis, and how greedy profitmongers have screwed everything up for everybody.

The songs are recorded in Bjelle Studio with Trond Breen as technician. Breen has also produced it together with Honningbarna. It was released on CD-R, given for free to the first 100 attendees for their show oct 8th at Rockefeller in Oslo.

It's Honningbarna themselves who have put out this torrent. Please seed it and help us share the message to everyone who either want to or need to hear them.
